code: import React,{useState}from'react';import Navigation from'../components/Navigation/Navigation';import Header from'../components/Header/Header';import{Input}from'antd';import TodoItem from'../components/TodoItem/TodoItem';import NoContent from'../components/Navigation/icons/add-task.png';import'./style.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MainPage=()=>{const[inputStr,setInputStr]=useState('');const[todoList,setTodoList]=useState([]);const handleChange=e=>{const value=e.target.value;setInputStr(value);};const handlePressEnter=e=>{const value=e.target.value;if(!value.trim())return;setTodoList(prev=>[...prev,{id:Math.random(),title:value,isDone:false}]);setInputStr('');};const handleChangeTodo=item=>{const indexTodo=todoList.findIndex(todo=>item.id===todo.id);const newTodoItem={id:item.id,title:item.title,isDone:!item.isDone};setTodoList(prev=>{const newTodoList=[...prev.slice(0,indexTodo),newTodoItem,...prev.slice(indexTodo+1)];return newTodoList;});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("body",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigation,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"search-bar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{onPressEnter:handlePressEnter,onChange:handleChange,value:inputStr,placeholder:"Type the task"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tasks-block",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[todoList.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TodoItem,{item:item,onChange:handleChangeTodo},Math.random())),!todoList.length&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:'no-todo',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\u0417\u0430\u0434\u0430\u0447 \u043F\u043E\u043A\u0430 \u043D\u0435\u0442"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:NoContent,alt:""})]})]})})]})]});};export{MainPage};
